attributes.action: Put fuel cells in homes, not cars, by allowing a 50% Hydrogen content in the domestic gas supply
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This used to be the levels that Town Gas had up until the '50s, so we know it's safe. The gas is supplied at normal mains pressure, so it's cheap. The Fuel Cell becomes the Combined Heat & Power unit and can integrate all forms of microgeneration + the distribution network is already in place.
